sense.def:
To straighten something
pomeni nekaj urediti ali dati na pravo mesto.

seg.quote: Straightening his tie, he knocked on the door.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekdo sklanja in potem
he straightens
ali
he straightens up
, to pomeni, da telo postavi naravnost in pokonci.

seg.quote: The man straightened and looked him in the face.
He straightens up, combs his hair, and walks into the meeting.

sense.def:
To straighten out a confused situation
pomeni, da se nam posreči urediti položaj ali ga pravilno organizirati.

seg.quote: It'll take six weeks to get things straightened out.
